channel.title: Help me now!
channel.description:
Hello, people!
I have a portforwarding question. Currently I use hamachi, and that just sucks. I cannot use uTorrent, because running the server and uTorrent creates this error "Listen error, you should change your listen port." I also use a thomson router, so how would I be able to portforward, but when I assign a new port, it gives me the port range, what's that? OK so please help me portforward, thank you. My thomson is something like a tvgate2e0ewk9 - =P But no "S" in it, you know what I mean...

item.title: Help me now!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Firstly, it’s unwise to give imperatives in a help section. Secondly, http://www.portforward.com should cover your router, I did a quick google search and found;

http://portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Thomson-Alcatel/SpeedTouch510Alt/default.htm

So if that’s not the one, surely you can find your own?

Read full topic

item.title: Help me now!
